description:
Update Feb 14: Fixed login issues.

Explorer for Dropbox provides access to your Dropbox files and lets you manage them. It also includes a full-featured file manager for your local files.
Features:
• three panel interface: Dropbox files, local files and queue of downloads/uploads
• create, delete, move, copy and rename files and folders on your Dropbox and mobile device
• download and upload files or even whole folders
• built-in text editor for editing files
• use the smart multi-select feature to perform actions with multiple files/folders
• copy the URL of a Dropbox file to share it with somebody
• sort the file list by name, type, size or modification date
• power scroll gesture to reach the top/bottom of a file list
• open local/downloaded files with their associated app

Note: The developer of this app is not associated with Dropbox Inc. The app was created in good faith and has been tested extensively. However, the developer is not responsible for any damage to files, devices, servers, or any other electronic equipment used in conjunction with this app.
